revision.text:
This is the default [[sound sequence]] for most platforms and elevators in ''[[Doom]]'' and ''[[Hexen]]''. It is defined differently in zdoom.pk3 and in the ''Hexen'' [[IWAD]].
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== The default [[ZDoom]] definition: :Platform playuntildone plats/pt1_strt stopsound plats/pt1_stop end
The ''Hexen'' definition: :Platform playuntildone PlatformStart playrepeat StoneMove stopsound PlatformStop end [[Category:Sound sequences]]
